name: Lysandra Veilshadow
appearance: Tall and slender with an air of perpetual weariness. Her long, silver hair is often pulled back into a loose braid adorned with small crystals. She wears layered robes in muted earth tones, embroidered with arcane sigils that seem to shimmer when she moves.

stunts.name: Arcane Recall
stunts.description: +4 Mageship: When studying a spell or ancient tomes, Lysandra can recall the incantation with perfect accuracy.

stunts.name: Shattered Lore
stunts.description: +3 Research: She has an uncanny ability to piece together fragmented knowledge from scattered ruins and libraries.

stunts.name: Insightful Inquiry
stunts.description: +2 Investigation: Lysandra can ask the right questions, uncovering hidden truths or clues that others overlook.

fears: Repeating the mistakes of the past
desires: Unravel the mysteries of the Shattered Realms

backstory.origin: Born into a lineage of powerful mages who were exiled from their order after a devastating ritual gone wrong, Lysandra grew up in the ruins of forgotten citadels.
backstory.formativeEvent: The death of her mentor during a failed attempt to restore an ancient elemental spell left her both devastated and determined to honor his memory by seeking out lost knowledge.
backstory.secret: She carries a small fragment of crystal, rumored to be from the ritual that went wrong, which she believes holds secrets yet undiscovered.
backstory.summary: Now wandering through the desolate lands, Lysandra seeks fragments of ancient texts and relics that might hold the key to restoring balance in the Shattered Realms.

voice.quirks: Often pauses to intone a word in an ancient language, as if seeking the right phrase.
